abstract.text: The base class for the TrustlessSDK.

inlineContent.text: TrustlessSDK streamlines the integration of the Staq API into iOS applications, delivering enhanced security and data protection. It provides developers with a comprehensive API designed to facilitate seamless communication with the Staq platform.
You can use TrustlessSDK object to access the specific functionalities by using the corresponding provider. For example, to register new user you can access
In order to use the TrustlessSDK’s capabilities, you need to initialize
instance with ClientId and ClientSecrets, also you need configure client certificate to pass server security requirements.
Follow this article for detailed instructions:
